name: gusplease
text: Old to senile to scared to downtrodden to suicidal.

name: boredom_man
text: Yeah, that's been my weekend, too.

name: andyk
text: A comment left by andyk was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, kenthegod, Darthemed)

name: gouldgonewild
text: Aww yeah, Randy Newman all up ins.

name: heccibiggs
text: I'm short, I'm Jewish, I'm homosexual, and I'm from Sheffield. I'm fucked!

name: i_love_kate
text: Whoo, Sheffield.

name: terriblerobot
text: I have family in Sheffield. It is a pretty rad place.

name: fourganger
text: Chubby for the Alan Bennett ref.

name: heatbag
text: No one would be happy to hear that suicide is aggressively proscribed.

name: tekende
text: Sure they would. It's when suicide is PREscribed that you have to watch out.

name: straw
text:
Just hell of chubbies y'all.

Hey Tekende, have you heard of the band, Man Man? They sound like Tom Waits!

name: tekende
text: No I haven't. I guess I will have to look them up.

name: selbencoirlo
text:
Chubby for directing someone to Man Man, though I think their stylistic similarity to Tom Waits is overstated (not just by you, by everyone). I think people just say that because it's easier than trying to figure out what they actually sound like.

They both make excellent music though, and most people who like one will I think like both, so it's all good.

name: mat4900
text: Cornelius's facial expressions is what does this for me. From bemusement to angry concern. A definitive five.

name: tristanhw
text: Hes old.....he MUST be going to commit suicide

name: trevor
text: ALT: Unkind musings overheard; suicide aggresively proscribed

name: nsrdude
text: They have to help him because society will not. This is a fact of life.

name: shutup_shutup
text: Is perhaps most basic.

name: relaxing
text: three feet below the surface i can still make out your wavy face / and if i could only reach you i think i could leave this place

name: bourbonsamurai
text: I love that Ray says "did he finally get senility?" as though he has sat around at home thinking, "Dang, how is Cornelius still makin' sense?"

name: chewy
text: All old people contemplate sleeping on crossings.

name: tekende
text: Perhaps we should ask pogo about this.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Shhh. He's sleeping.

name: jlaw
text: hmm, on second thought maybe it was this strip that got me hooked

name: lavosxii
text: Cornelius crosses his arm against the chest at this. His stern look of disapproval penetrates the glass.

name: jonazoulay
text: Ray's initial reaction scream really gets me.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: Poetry from Ray's Collected Stickies.
Roast Beef: Five bucks for poetry

name: splendorr
text: These poems are exquisite. A hardboiled egg cannot contain a weapon in secret. How could it?

name: red-barchetta
text: Why does the window glass conceal Ray and Beef? Tinted?

name: mustakrakesh
text: This strip reminds me of crying to Morrissy in high school...yes, I suck.

name: dj_douche
text: This story arc made me laugh more than any other. It would be the best evar except for the sheer grandeur and adventure of the great outdoor fight. IMHO.

name: thedice
text: I love trying to imagine Ray's 'EEEAUGH!'. Seriously.

name: carlyle
text: Panel six, Cornelius looks so forgiving, like the grandfather that will always forgive you. Then panel seven happened.

name: greenkoolayd
text: senility is something you get, rather than a cumulative degeneration of ones mental faculties, apparently.
